field.name: title
field.title: Title
field.description: Campaign Title - Comes from Public Name on Campaign in Salesforce

field.name: description
field.title: Description
Description
field.description: A brief description of this campaign (from Description field on Campaign in Salesforce)

field.name: body
field.title: Body
Body
field.description: The body of the pitch for this campaign shown above the donation form

field.name: thank_you_message
field.title: Thank You Message
Thank You Message
field.description: This is the message displayed to a donor after they have donated.
field.default: Your donation has been received. Thank you for your support.

field.name: default_personal_appeal
field.title: Default Personal Appeal
Default Personal Appeal
field.description: When someone creates a personal campaign, this text is the default value in the Personal Appeal field. The user can choose to keep the default or edit it to personalize their appeal
field.default: Please join me in my efforts to raise money for a wonderful organization.

field.name: default_personal_thank_you
field.title: Default Personal Thank You
Default Personal Thank You
field.description: When someone creates a personal campaign, this text is the default value in the Thank You Message field. The user can choose to keep the default or edit it to personalize their thank you to their donors
field.default: Thank you for donating to my campaign. Your donation helps me towards achieving my fundraising goal for a great organization.

field.name: status
field.title: Status
Status
field.description: The current status of the campaign (From Status field on Campaign in Salesforce)

field.name: goal
field.title: Goal
Goal
field.description: The dollar amount goal for this campaign (from Expected Revenue field on Campaign in Salesforce)

field.name: donations_total
field.title: Total Raised
Total Raised
field.description: The total dollar amount raised thus far (from Amount Won Opportunities on Campaign in Salesforce)

field.name: donations_count
field.title: Total Donations
Number of Donations
field.description: Total count of donations (from Number of Won Opportunities field on Campaign in Salesforce)

field.name: form_embed
field.title: Form Embed Code
Form Embed Code
field.description: The embed code for the donation form used by this campaign (from the Form Embed Code field on Campaign in Salesforce)

field.name: form_embed_recurring
field.title: Form Embed Code
Recurring Form Embed Code
field.description: The embed code for the recurring donation form used by this campaign (from the Form Embed Code field on Campaign in Salesforce)

field.name: allow_personal
field.title: Allow Personal Fundraising?
Allow Personal?
field.description: If checked, allow the creation of personal campaign pages for this campaign (from the Allow Personal field on Campaign in Salesforce)

field.name: date_start
field.title: Start Date
Start Date
field.description: The start date of the campaign

field.name: date_end
field.title: End Date
End Date
field.description: The end date of the campaign
